_header: Almighty God that made all thing
_description: A rhyming opening to a prose tract, Antidotarium Nicholai — one cross-rhymed quatrain

CamStJohn37.Transcription:
Alle miȝti god þat made al þingefader & sone &
                    holigostAlle he clyp at bi ginninge& be it made for mannis loue
                    moste
